_88datum.description: Represents a set of data used for machine learning in Jubatus.
_88datum.title: datum

items.description: Input data represented in string. It is represented as key-value pairs of data. Name of keys cannot contain “$” sign.
items.title: string_values

items.description: Input data represented in numeric value. It is represented as key-value pairs of data.
items.title: num_values

items.description: Input data represented in binary value. It is represented as key-value pairs of data.
items.title: binary_values

___save.description: Store the learing model to the local disk at ALL servers.
___save.title: save

___return.description: Path to the saved model for each server. The key of the map is in form of ipaddr_portnumber.

___get_config.description: Returns server configuration from a server. For format of configuration, see API reference of each services.
___get_config.title: get_config

___get_proxy_status.description: Returns proxy status. This is an RPC method for proxy. When you use this for server, RPC error will be raised.
___get_proxy_status.title: get_proxy_status

___return.description: Internal state for proxy. The key of most outer map is in form of ipaddr_portnumber.

___do_mix.description: Force cluster to fire mix. Call this RPC to Jubatus server directly. When you call this to proxy, RPC error will be raised.
___do_mix.title: do_mix

___get_status.description: Returns server status from ALL servers. Each server is represented by a pair of IP address and port.
___get_status.title: get_status

___return.description: Internal state for each servers. The key of most outer map is in form of ipaddr_portnumber.

___load.description: Restore the saved model from local disk at ALL servers.
___load.title: load

___return.description: True if this function loads files successfully at all servers

___clear.description: Completely clears the model at ALL servers.
___clear.title: clear

___return.description: True when the model was cleared successfully
